img_text: FART RAPE: HOW CRAZY ARE FEMINISTS? "By farting louder the man is using passive aggressive violence to position himself as dominant, this intimidates the woman to subconsciously not release as much flatulence and thus the woman fearing for her safety doesn't fart as loud as a sign of submissiveness, this in turn contributes to rape culture and women being oppressed." Ashleigh Ingle, Feminist
